00017 package com.uperto.smartmenu;
00018 
00019 import android.app.Activity;
00020 import android.gesture.GestureLibraries;
00021 import android.gesture.GestureLibrary;
00022 import android.graphics.Bitmap;
00023 import android.graphics.BitmapFactory;
00024 import android.graphics.Color;
00025 import android.graphics.Paint;
00026 import android.os.Bundle;
00027 import android.view.MotionEvent;
00028 import android.view.View;
00029 import android.widget.Button;
00030 import android.widget.TextView;
00031 
00032 public class SmartMenuActivity extends Activity {
00033         private GestureLibrary  mLibrary;
00034         private TextView                mText;
00035         private Button                  mButton1;
00036         private Button                  mButton2;
00037         
00039     @Override
00040     public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
00041         super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
00042         
00043         setContentView(R.layout.main);
00044         
00045         // Init the gesture library
00046         mLibrary = GestureLibraries.fromRawResource(this, R.raw.gestures);
00047         if (!mLibrary.load()) {
00048                 finish();
00049         }
00050         
00051         mText = (TextView) findViewById(R.id.text);
00052         mButton1 = (Button) findViewById(R.id.button1);
00053         mButton2 = (Button) findViewById(R.id.button2);
00054         
00055         // Init the buttons
00056         mButton1.setOnTouchListener(new View.OnTouchListener() {
00057                         @Override
00058                         public boolean onTouch(View v, MotionEvent event) {
00059                                 mText.setText("I did things");
00060                                 return false;
00061                         }
00062         });
00063         
00064         mButton2.setOnTouchListener(new View.OnTouchListener() {
00065                         @Override
00066                         public boolean onTouch(View v, MotionEvent event) {
00067                                 mText.setText("I did other things");
00068                                 return false;
00069                         }
00070         });
00071         
00072         // Init the SmartMenu with our gesture library
00073         SmartMenuOverlayView smartMenu = (SmartMenuOverlayView) findViewById(R.id.gestures);
00074         smartMenu.setGestureLibrary(mLibrary);
00075         
00076         Paint painter = smartMenu.getPainter();
00077         painter.setColor(Color.GREEN);
00078         
00079         smartMenu.setBackgroundColor(Color.argb(200, 255, 0, 0));
00080         
00081         // Add items to the menu
00082         Bitmap bmp = BitmapFactory.decodeResource(getResources(), R.drawable.icon1);
00083         smartMenu.addMenuItem(new SmartMenuOverlayView.SmartMenuItem("Item 1", bmp) {
00084                 public boolean onItemSelected() {
00085                         mText.setText("Item 1 selected");
00086                                 return true;
00087                 }
00088         });
00089         
00090         bmp = BitmapFactory.decodeResource(getResources(), R.drawable.icon2);
00091         smartMenu.addMenuItem(new SmartMenuOverlayView.SmartMenuItem("Item 2", bmp) {
00092                 public boolean onItemSelected() {
00093                         mText.setText("Item 2 selected");
00094                                 return true;
00095                 }
00096         });
00097         
00098         bmp = BitmapFactory.decodeResource(getResources(), R.drawable.icon3);
00099         smartMenu.addMenuItem(new SmartMenuOverlayView.SmartMenuItem("Item 3", bmp) {
00100                 public boolean onItemSelected() {
00101                         mText.setText("Item 3 selected");
00102                                 return true;
00103                 }
00104         });
00105         
00106         bmp = BitmapFactory.decodeResource(getResources(), R.drawable.icon4);
00107         smartMenu.addMenuItem(new SmartMenuOverlayView.SmartMenuItem("Item 4", bmp) {
00108                 public boolean onItemSelected() {
00109                         mText.setText("Item 4 selected");
00110                                 return true;
00111                 }
00112         });
00113         
00114         bmp = BitmapFactory.decodeResource(getResources(), R.drawable.icon5);
00115         smartMenu.addMenuItem(new SmartMenuOverlayView.SmartMenuItem("Item 5", bmp) {
00116                 public boolean onItemSelected() {
00117                         mText.setText("Item 5 selected");
00118                                 return true;
00119                 }
00120         });
00121         
00122         bmp = BitmapFactory.decodeResource(getResources(), R.drawable.icon6);
00123         smartMenu.addMenuItem(new SmartMenuOverlayView.SmartMenuItem("Item 6", bmp) {
00124                 public boolean onItemSelected() {
00125                         mText.setText("Item 6 selected");
00126                                 return true;
00127                 }
00128         });
00129         
00130         if (savedInstanceState != null && savedInstanceState.getBoolean("menuOpened")) {
00131                 smartMenu.open(false);
00132         }
00133     }
00134     
00135     @Override
00136     protected void onSaveInstanceState(Bundle outState) {
00137         super.onSaveInstanceState(outState);
00138         
00139         outState.putBoolean("menuOpened", true);
00140     }
00141 }
